text: A combination puzzle, also called a sequential move puzzle can be solved by actions. An example of this would be the famous Rubik's Cube. The Rubik's Cube is a cube with multiple different colors and the goal is to solve the cube by doing specific actions to arrange the colors correctly. Combination puzzles can also be used for mathematical problems that would be difficult to solve in real life. == References == Category:Puzzles
title: Combination puzzle
